titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of the Army to carry out a project for water supply, Bastrop-Morehouse Parish, Louisiana.
To authorize the Secretary of the Army to carry out a project for water supply, Bastrop-Morehouse Parish, Louisiana.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

term.name: Federal aid to water resources development

bill.summary: Directs the Secretary of the Army to conduct a study for a water supply project for Bastrop-Morehouse Parish in Louisiana. Authorizes the Secretary to carry out the project if it is feasible.
